item.description:
Apologies for the confusion incubators,

I thought this had been edited or changed.  Our usual incubator this week will take place in Davis Square following the performance of the troupe I am in and direct Rebels Without Applauze.  Show time isnt til 8pm, so enjoy the extra half hour to grab some great grub in Davis.  Afterwards we will rock out incubator style in the basement of the movie theater for a short while then head out in Davis for some post incubator food and merriment as always.

Let me know if you have any questions and again I apologize this was not changed sooner.

Cheers!

Jason
item.how_to_find_us: In the backroom stirring up some laughter and ruckus!!
item.why: we need more laughter, fun, and acting in our lives. Don't take everything so seriously!
item.name: In Davis Square this week's Cambridge Improv Incubator!
